sections.heading: General, county attorneys; duty to enforce sections
sections.text: It shall be the duty of the county attorneys, in their counties, and the Attorney General to enforce the provisions of sections 59-501 to 59-508.SourceLaws 1939, c. 77, § 4, p. 315;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 59-526;R.S.1943, § 59-507.

59-507.Attorney General, county attorneys; duty to enforce sections.

It shall be the duty of the county attorneys, in their counties, and the Attorney General to enforce the provisions of sections 59-501 to 59-508.

SourceLaws 1939, c. 77, § 4, p. 315;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 59-526;R.S.1943, § 59-507.
